A lot of people email me that they are going to vote PVV.
Often for the first time. Entire families and circles of acquaintances want a change of direction to blow in politics in The Hague. They want to be proud of their country again. That they will also be remembered for once. They want to help other people and countries, but at some point it ends, we can only spend every euro once, they say, and our country is already overpopulated. And of course they also want a home, a better filled wallet, affordable care and a safe country for their children. They are touched by and recognize themselves in our slogan 'Dutch first'.

Dear people, thank you for all the support. We do it for you, not for ourselves. Please all vote on Wednesday and we will do our best for you. Trying to make your dreams come true. Standing up for you like never before. By working together with other parties. With you in our hearts and minds always in place 1. I promise you that. ❤️

#VotePVV #PVV
